sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { LessonPackage } from './lessonPackage.interface'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit{ ngOnInit(){ console.log('AppComponent.ngOnInit()'); } constructor() { console.log('AppComponent.constructor()'); } title = 'tp3final'; lessonPackage: LessonPackage = { title: '', description: '', category: '', level: '', prerequisite: [], tags: [], copyright: '' }; }
